XML Format: ValueSet-ValueSet-CareConnect-ACVPU-1

Download Raw xml 


<ValueSet xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="ValueSet-CareConnect-ACVPU-1"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>Care Connect ACVPU</h2><div><p>A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which describes whether a patient is mentally alert, unresponsive, responds to voice, responds to pain or is acutely confused.</p>
</div><p><b>Copyright Statement:</b> This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.</p><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul><li>Include codes from <a href="http://www.snomed.org/"><code>http://snomed.info/sct</code></a> where constraint  =  (248234008 |Mentally alert| OR 300202002 |Responds to voice| OR 450847001 |Responds to pain| OR 422768004 |Unresponsive| OR 130987000 |Acute confusion|)</li></ul></div>
  </text>
  <url value="https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/ValueSet/CareConnect-ACVPU-1"/>
  <version value="1.0.1"/>
  <name value="Care Connect ACVPU"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <date value="2018-11-08T16:01:00+00:00"/>
  <publisher value="HL7 UK"/>
  <description
               value="A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which describes whether a patient is mentally alert, unresponsive, responds to voice, responds to pain or is acutely confused."/>
  <copyright
             value="This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement."/>
  <compose>
    <include>
      <system value="http://snomed.info/sct"/>
      <filter>
        <property value="constraint"/>
        <op value="="/>
        <value
               value="(248234008 |Mentally alert| OR 300202002 |Responds to voice| OR 450847001 |Responds to pain| OR 422768004 |Unresponsive| OR 130987000 |Acute confusion|)"/>
      </filter>
    </include>
  </compose>
</ValueSet>
